name: Paper Tale
description:
Rain as come again, step into the world of paper golems and help them save their town

_________________________________

Our Game

Paper Tale is a quiet and contemplative exploration game.

A small paper golem goes to evacuate the water that invades his city to protect the villagers.

He will face the rain and the puddles, using the remains left behind by antediluvian mages.

_______________________________

Controls

Paper Tale use simple controls with only a "Move" and an "Interact" actions
